title: "Question everything...Even me."
description: Mario is an American Nicaraguan School student who questions everything that is presented to him. This skill was developed when he was taking the philosophy course provided by his high school, offered by Ms. Wilke (his teacher and mentor). After this intense boot camp of learning how to properly question to derive to the true meaning of things, he developed a curious personality and those that know him understand how curiosity has shaped his entire persona.
author: Mario Sanchez
